testcase.name: Search a Product MacBook Pro
testcase.system-out: @Smoke Scenario: Search a Product MacBook Pro &amp#27;[90m# src/test/resources/AppFeatures/Search.feature:4&amp#27;[0m launch url launch amazon application Search a Product MacBook Pro Step 1: I am on search page &amp#27;[32mGiven &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mI have a search field on Amazon Page&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# StepDefinitions.Searchsteps.i_have_a_search_field_on_amazon_page()&amp#27;[0m Step 2: Search the product with name:Apple MacBook Proprice: 1000 &amp#27;[32mWhen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mI search for a product with name &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m"Apple MacBook Pro"&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m and price &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m1000&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# StepDefinitions.Searchsteps.i_search_for_a_product_with_name_and_price(java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer)&amp#27;[0m Step 3: product Apple MacBook Prois displayed Search product is: Apple MacBook Pro &amp#27;[32mThen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mProduct with name &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m"Apple MacBook Pro"&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m should be displayed.&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# StepDefinitions.Searchsteps.product_with_name_should_be_displayed(java.lang.String)&amp#27;[0m logout from the application Search a Product MacBook Pro close the browserclose the bowser
